thread.title: Win VIP tickets to dine with rugby legends
thread.title_full: Win VIP tickets to dine with rugby legends - Telegraph

author: The Telegraph
title: Win VIP tickets to dine with rugby legends
text: What have Martin Johnson, Francois Pienaar, Nick Farr-Jones, David Kirk, John Smit and John Eales got in common? Rugby fans will know one answer: they all lifted the Webb Ellis Cup as the captains of World Cup-winning teams. But that’s not all. In addition, all six of these rugby legends are appearing at the Rugby Captains Dinner, an exclusive Telegraph Bespoke event in London, on the eve of this year’s competition. And, thanks to Vitality, six lucky Telegraph readers can win VIP Experience tickets to this fantastic evening of entertainment. The winners will enjoy: A Telegraph Bespoke champagne reception A private Q&A with the six captains A three-course meal designed by Michelin-starred chef Angela Hartnett Expert predictions and insight regarding the forthcoming tournament Exclusive live entertainment Access to the after-show party until 2am Many of the captains’ illustrious team-mates, and other celebrities, will also be present for what promises to be a memorable rugby evening. Vitality, the Official Wellness Partner of England Rugby, Scottish Rugby and the Welsh Rugby Union, has teamed up with the Telegraph to offer these fabulous prizes. The Rugby Captains Dinner takes place on 16 September 2015 at Battersea Evolution, with an audience of 1,000 in attendance. All you have to do to be in with a chance of winning any rugby fan's dream night out is enter your details in the form below by midnight on Sunday 13 September 2015. Online Form - Win VIP tickets to dine with rugby legends telegraph.co.uk Follow @telegraph
